roleset.name: decorate
roleset.note: FESTOON-V NOTES: What is a swag, exactly? (from festoon.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: Besides term life and whole life (the old standbys), we now have universal life, universal variable life, flexible adjustable universal life, policies with persistency bonuses, policies-1 festooned [*]-1 with exotic riders, living benefit policies, and on and on.

example.name: instrumental subject!
example.text: A good deal of the book is boring, particularly the endless allusions to high and pop culture and the frequent jokes festooning the text.

example.name: agentive
example.text: John festooned his bedroom with swags of burlap.
